title: FS: T-206 Scoops Carey PSA 5 (Southern Leaguer) - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T-206 Scoops Carey PSA 5 (Southern Leaguer) - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD

Family issue, so I need to liquidate a large portion of my collection, so I'm doing it in reverse order. No reasonable offer will be refused. Asking $400 or best offer. PayPal only. Responses in this thread will take precedence over e-mails.

[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/27y4osw.gif[/IMG][IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/wsa5x.gif[/IMG]
Not sure what this card has been going for lately as my VCP membership lapsed, but I'll sell it for $20 less than the average of the last 3 sales on eBay if anyone is interested,
